Minorities Falling Through The Net

09 Jul 1999

While overall Internet usage is soaring, a US government study, Falling Through The Net reports that minority families are lagging far behind in access.

\nWhile there is a strong link between income and access, minority families show much lower rates of access than even white families on an equivalent income.

\nMore analysis is courtesy of the BBC. There's also a less graphics-intensive version.
